start.errorNoId: Could not determine your Telegram ID.
help.text:
*Available commands:*

/start â€” register and greet
/help â€” show this help message
/products â€” list your added products
/add <product_name> â€” add a product by name (e.g., apple)
/remove <product_name> â€” remove a product from your list
/clear â€” clear your entire product list
/upload â€” upload a photo of your fridge for product recognition
/recipes â€” get recipe suggestions based on your products and favorites
/favorites â€” show your saved favorite recipes
/menu â€” show the main menu with buttons
